title: Repairable headphones are the future, but they’re not perfect yet
description: I hope to see the repairable headphone market grow, but there will be some headaches.

title: The Pixel 8’s rumored cameras could fix my biggest gripes with the Pixel 7
description: From a brighter Night Sight to better autofocus, the Pixel 8 series could address my biggest bugbears.

title: Can a MacBook Air fit into an Android addict’s lifestyle?
description: I picked up a 15-inch M2-powered MacBook Air to find out.
